name: EasterEggHunt
0:
”Alexa open easter egg hunt”
”Alexa start easter egg hunt”
”Alexa begin easter egg hunt”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easter egg hunt
des: The player can set up to 10 clues for the other players to find using www.scavangerhuntlist.com The other players can then use the Alexa devive to read out these clues to them and alert Alexa when they have been found. Once all the clues have been found the game will be over.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
